description:
Construction of a 22 unit residential development including an affordable housing element 

 APPLICANT'S PLAN NOS.:  DP05016A, DP05010A, DP05011A,                         DP05012A, DP05014A, DP05015A,                         DP05303A, DP05301A, DP05304A,                         DP05300A
decision_conditions: That the London Borough of Camden be informed that the London Borough of Islington objects to the size and form of the proposed building which creates an unsatisfactory visual relationship to the adjoining terrace and the Grade II Listed terrace of properties opposite to the detriment of the appearance adjoining properties, and opposite terrace in particular and the street scene in general.
